thread.title: Muslim Woman Called ‘Nazi Scum’ For Not Supporting Sharia Law
thread.title_full: Muslim Woman Called ‘Nazi Scum’ For Not Supporting Sharia Law

author: Kelen M
title: Muslim Woman Called ‘Nazi Scum’ For Not Supporting Sharia Law
text:
Muslim Woman Called ‘Nazi Scum’ For Not Supporting Sharia Law 'They call me a white supremacist' Infowars.com - March 20, 2017 Comments 
A Canadian Muslim from Pakistan describes how witnessing the dark side of Sharia Law made her realize how free people are in Western society. 
In Islam a lot of Christians and Muslims are persecuted because they’re different. My family members have seen people accused of blasphemy law tied to the back of cars and dragged through the streets and killed that way. 
The woman was interviewed while attending an anti-M103 protest and was called “Nazi scum” and a “white supremacist” by leftist protesters who according to her, “wouldn’t last a single day living under Sharia law.” 
M103 is a controversial law proposal that attacks free-speech under the guise of fighting Islamaphobia. 
“There’s a Christian girl who’s a refugee and was accused of blasphemy, but she escaped with her life and made it to Canada. Can you imagine how she feels when something similar to the blasphemy law she escaped from is being implemented here in Canada?” Related Articles
